name: 3asoftwares
description: Frontend applications monorepo - Admin, Seller, Shell apps

scripts.build: yarn build:admin && yarn build:shell && yarn build:seller
scripts.test: yarn test:admin && yarn test:shell && yarn test:seller
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspace @3asoftwares/admin-app run test:coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/shell-app run test:coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/seller-app run test:coverage
scripts.lint: yarn lint:admin && yarn lint:shell && yarn lint:seller
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace @3asoftwares/admin-app run lint:fix && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/shell-app run lint:fix && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/seller-app run lint:fix
